product_name: Grivel G1+ S.A. Ice Axe with Leash - 58cm
long_description: Gear up for classic glacier climbs with the strong and trusty Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe. Hot-forged, 1-piece head has an ergonomic shape so it sits comfortably in your hand while ascending snowfields and glaciers. Carbon steel spike plunges easily into hard-packed snow and ice. S.A. (Self Arrest) curvature of shaft enhances arrest capability of axe and increases spike penetration on ascent and descent. Strong aluminum alloy shaft keeps the weight of the Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe down to 408g. Includes a simple leash.
short_description: Gear up for classic glacier climbs with the strong and trusty Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe.
